StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
Engineering Manager and a Software Architect with a specialization on evaluation and
management of projects with open source technologies having 9 years of experience.

PositionHistory.Title: Engineering Manager
PositionHistory.Description:
This company is a offshore development center for stripes39 group of companies. Our
primary clients are concept.com, cmn.com, educationlabs.com. They all are mostly into
education portfolio business and generate leads for universities in US.
●   We have about 250+ websites to maintain for new features, seo updates and other
works.
●   Some of the big sites that we maintain are w ww.accreditedonlinecolleges.org,
www.collegeathome.com, www.edudemic.com
●   We are a very small team(4 people) but we are single handedly managing work of this
magnitude alone.
●   To achieve this kind of work we have created lots of tools and have automated most of
our works. For example one of the things in our compliance matrix is that all the sites in our portfolio should be mobile friendly to google. We have created a script which uses
selenium and checks each and every website of ours on google website that it's mobile
friendly or not. If it sees some url is not complying it sends a mail to us and we
immediately look into it.
●   Most of our websites in wordpress so we have developed many themes and plugin for
our websites to do many things.
●   We have also developed many reporting tools which uses google analytics and webmasters apis and keep checking our websites on the parameters we have set. If any
parameter (eg. bounceRate, totalPageviews etc) is going haywire it sends us reports
immediately and we focus only on those issues.
●   In addition to that we maintain all the backend servers of the company. We have the the biggest of instances that AWS(amazon) can offer and we maintain each and every
aspect of it. We have automated this process also by using chef and knife tools.
Technologies Used:

Apache, PHP, HTML, CSS, Mysql, Javascript, NodeJs, Haraka, Varnish, EC2, ELB, Route53,
S3, Aurora RDS, Symfony, Twig, jQuery, AngularJs, Bootstrap, Wordpress, Less, Sass, Git,
Zabbix, Selenium, Webpagetest, Chef, Nginx, Jenkins CI

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 86% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Project Manager
PositionHistory.Description:
●   This company is an educational portal for kids from class 1st to 12th
●   My role in this company is to handle a group of few talented people and led them to handle parts of website like Blog and Expert module.
●   Expert module is the one in which we give our full coverage. As I said my company owns
an education portal. At this portal students can ask any questions related to any subject.
A dedicated team of experts and freelancers continuously keep on answering these
questions and our team's job is to send all the relevant questions to relevant experts.
●   This module also generate a large number of reports and some critical reports are used
for the payments to freelancers.
●   Our team is also a hub to request all the small changes and marketing pages
requirements, which needs to go very quickly on live site.
●   Due to large numbers of requests from number of other teams, We created our own
mechanism of sending well organized and controlled releases in the form of bundles. We
created our own shell scripts to do that and now it has become a standard in this
company.
●   To improve the standard environment on development machine we created our own
LAMP stack with which a developer can recreate his system with in 10 minutes from scratch.
●   To increase the control upon our code, I have written a PHP framework from scratch
called crucible. I have put it as open source and hosted on github.
https://github.com/thecrucible/crucible

Technologies used:

Apache, PHP, Mysql, Varnish, Git, CakePHP, Symfony, Javascript, jQuery, Mongodb,
Bashscript

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 76% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Architect and Product Manager
PositionHistory.Description:
This company is an insurance company and an indirect subsidiary of Berkshire
Hathaway. It uses a web portal and a call center to sell insurance policies.
●   My job was to maintain the whole technical aspect of the business and created the whole IT infrastructure of the company.
●   Associated to this company from its inception.
●   Hired the whole technical team including software development team, Server Admin and System Support team and testing team.
●   We created Motor Insurance, Travel Insurance, Travel Group insurance, Health
Insurance, Personal Accident cover and Lead management system products.
●   We also revamped the motor insurance and travel insurance products twice.
●   Created the whole IT infrastructure of the company from scratch including cloud servers,
MySQL cluster, inhouse system networking, inhouse zimbra mail server, Inhouse VOIP
calling server, sonicwall firewall, internet lease lines, gigabit switches, PRI calling lines
etc.
●   Created own bare minimum version of Linux to be used on some of the servers.

Technologies Used:
Apache, PHP, Mysql, Mysql Cluster, Javascript, SVN, YUI, jQuery, AWS, Netmagic, Sonicwall,
Asterisk, PRI Calling lines, Call center solutions

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 94% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
This company is the most successful company in internet industry in India. It owns one
of the most popular products like naukri.com, 99acres.com, jeevansathi.com, brijj.com,
siksha.com etc.
●   Worked on brijj.com product to make it a linkedin replacement in India.Worked on some
core module of website like home page, inbox, and groups and created some of them
from scratch.
●   Created code and software to be used on very huge set of data and user activity.
●   Created architectures having more emphasis on frontend, to lower server's load and generate quick response to the user's action.

Technologies Used:

PositionHistory.Title: Senior PHP Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Convex Digital


●   This company was a service based software company and used to take projects through
bids on various hire professional websites and through own permanent clients.
●   Worked on various types of projects like hire professional's websites, dating websites,
gaming websites etc.

Technologies Used:
Apache, PHP, Mysql, Javascript, HTML, CSS

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 100% of this job

Degree.DegreeName: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication
Degree.Comments:
Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication from Rajiv Gandhi Technical
University, Bhopal in 2007

Tejaswi Sharma
Engineering Manager
Intelligent Studios Pvt Ltd
9810309847, tej.nri@gmail.com


Overview
Engineering Manager and a Software Architect with a specialization on evaluation and
management of projects with open source technologies having 9 years of experience.


Summary of work experience

Engineering Manager	May 2014 - Present
Intelligent Studious


●   This company is a offshore development center for stripes39 group of companies. Our

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Tejaswi Sharma's experience appears to be strongly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Programming) and slightly concentrated in Sales (mostly General). Tejaswi Sharma has 12 years of work experience, with 6 years of management experience, including a mid-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory:
Current position is a mid-level management role: Engineering Manager
Starting on 5/1/2014, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 5 years and 7 months:
	Title: Engineering Manager for Intelligent Studious
Starting on 7/1/2013, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 10 months:
	Title: Project Manager for Meritnation.com
